prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon with a floating, ethereal body and glowing eyes.
I want to see a mischievous Pokemon that loves to play tricks on trainers.
Generate a spooky Pokemon that haunts dark forests and has a playful personality.
Make a unique Pokemon that has a blue color scheme and resembles a spirit.
Imagine a ghostly creature with a playful demeanor and a love for the night.
Design a mysterious Pokemon that appears in urban areas to scare unsuspecting people.
Show me a ghost-type Pokemon that has a whimsical design and eerie features.
